text: Jafar Najafi (; born 26 September 1994) is an Iranian professional futsal player. He is currently a member of PAS Tehran in the Iran Futsal's 1st Division. == Honours == === Club === * Iran Futsal's 1st Division ** Champion (1): 2015–16 (Arjan Shiraz) == References == Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Hamadan Category:Iranian men's futsal players Category:Futsal forwards Category:Almas Shahr Qom FSC players Category:Arjan Shiraz FSC players Category:Sohan Mohammad Sima FSC players
title: Jafar Najafi
